Posts.Content: Dec 26, 2008 12:24PM jojobeans wrote: I'm so sorry to hear about your pain. I have a bunch of different pillows. I have ones for sitting up in bed that a more firm (I use 3), the one I use for sleeping is soft and allows me to lay almost flat. I also have a body pillow that I LOVE!!! It helps me with lying on my side. I hope this helps.  Joell
